member.name: T:OgvPlayer.VideoPlayer
member.summary: Full class not implemented in Monogame main branch. Used the Monogame-SDL2 branch, which had this implemented Monogame-SDL2 https://github.com/flibitijibibo/MonoGame

member.name: F:OgvPlayer.OgvVideo.AlBuffer_NotAvailable
member.summary: A dummy OpenAL buffer handle, indicating that the buffer in question is not available.

member.name: F:OgvPlayer.OgvVideo.AlBuffer_StreamMe
member.summary: A dummy OpenAL buffer handle, indicating that the buffer in question is inactive due to streaming.
